title: If the World Ends, That's Cool!
description:
Friday the 24th, August 2012.
The world will end due to a meteorite crash... tomorrow. But people are fine with it. No one is screaming. No one is praying. Because they are all... cool.

Chapter 13 (of 35) of '2012 지구가 멸망한다면?' - a collection of oneshot webcomics related to the supposed end of the world in 2012.
